resources.string: Choose a character from the Mass Effect game series
"Congratulations, you've completed the level! You need to be a connoisseur of space games to guess everything the first time."
Choose a character who is the main character of a particular game (or series of games).
"Congratulations, you've completed the level! You'll need to be that much of a gamer to complete this level."
Now lets find out how well you know Pokemon lore! Choose the one who is stronger
There are a huge bunch of them in the world of Pokemon, you need to be interested in this world a lot in order to know who is stronger and who is weaker
Understanding games is good. But you also need to know the developers. What companies make games?
You are interested in the game world and how it develops, well done!
There are many game series. But which series has more games?
Congratulations on completing level :3
Lets digress a little from the gaming industry and plunge into animation. Who is stronger?
You are familiar not only with games, but also with anime, thats cool!
Who is the main character of this or that animated series?
It was easy
What animated series takes place in the present?
Congratulations on completing level :3
There are heroes, there are villains. Pick your villains!
Congratulations on completing level :3
Its nice to watch all the episodes in one gulp, but there are projects that have not yet finished releasing new episodes. Which?
Congratulations on completing level :3
Lets move from cartoon to movie. So, what kind of studios are film studios?

Finished the final level! You can return to the main menu and start over.
